siteMetadata.title: Solar Sailer
siteMetadata.author: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.description: I am a developer, designer and product manager from France. Co-founder of Pixelnest Studio.

markdownRemark.html:
This tweet could not better describe my feeling:

Modern journalism is 90% reporting what people are saying on Twitter.

— God (@TheTweetOfGod) July 22, 2013

excerptQuote.name: God
excerptQuote.quote: Modern journalism is 90% reporting what people are saying on Twitter.
